title: Leveraging next-generation tech, how K-12 educational institutions can make students future-ready - YourStory
content: Leveraging next-generation tech, how K-12 educational institutions can make students future-ready  YourStory
description: Innovation in the educational domain is slowly ramping up and is yet to shoot skyrockets. Industry experts discuss and anticipate futuristic technology that will spark the future of the educational sector.
